articles.title: Kim Jong Un Meets Song Tao Again
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Meets Song Tao Again
Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea and chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, once again met and had a talk with Song Tao, head of the International Liaison Department of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, on Tuesday.
					 The respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un congratulated the Chinese art troupe led by Song Tao upon its successful visit to the DPRK under the special care and expectation of the two parties and two governments and highly appreciated the efforts of the Chinese comrades who brilliantly decorated the 31st April Spring Friendship Art Festival.
					
					 He said the art troupe's visit to the DPRK this time was the very good one which brought about excellent results in the good period and that it further strengthened the special ties and deepened feelings of mutual respect between the two parties and two peoples of the DPRK and China and set a good model of cultural and art exchange between the DPRK and China.
					
					 Song Tao said with deep emotion that the Korean people most warmly and grandly welcomed them with fraternal feelings of intimacy wherever they went, adding that through the visit they warmly felt the particular and kind feelings of the WPK and Korean people toward the Chinese party and people.
					
					 In particular, he expressed once again deep thanks to 
					
					 Kim Jong Un for his personal measures for them, saying that the successful visit of the Chinese art troupe was entirely the fruition of the special intimacy and deep interest and care of the supreme leaders of the two parties and two countries.
					
					 Kim Jong Un said that the Central Committee of the WPK would in the future continue to work hard to further boost the political trust between the two parties and two countries and develop the DPRK-China relations at a fresh high level on the basis of the traditional friendship and unity as required by the new era.
					
					 He exchanged with Song Tao in-depth views on several matters for activating exchanges and visits in different fields and further boosting the strategic and tactical cooperation between the two parties.
					
					 He asked Song Tao to certainly convey his warm greetings to General Secretary Xi Jinping, the greatest friend and closest comrade of the Korean people, who sent the art troupe in the significant period and greatly delighted the Korean people, and to the Chinese people.
					
					 The talk proceeded in an atmosphere overflowing with the comradely, sincere and feelings of friendship.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Gives Dinner for Song Tao and Art Troupe of China
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Gives Dinner for Song Tao and Artistes of Chinese Art Troupe
Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea and chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, gave a dinner for Song Tao, head of the International Liaison Department of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, and artistes of the Chinese art troupe on Tuesday.
					 Present there were his wife Ri Sol Ju, Choe Ryong Hae, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the WPK, vice-chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and vice-chairman of the C.C., WPK, Ri Su Yong, member of the Political Bureau and vice-chairman of the C.C., WPK, Kim Yo Jong, alternate member of the Political Bureau and first vice department director of the C.C., WPK, Jo Yong Won, Kwon Hyok Bong, Kim Pyong Ho and Kim Song Nam, vice department directors of the C.C., WPK, and other members of the C.C., WPK and Korean artistes.
					
					 Present there on invitation were Song Tao, head of the International Liaison Department of the C.C., CPC, Li Qun, vice-minister of Culture and Tourism of China, artistes of the Chinese art troupe and Li Jinjun, Chinese ambassador to the DPRK.
					
					 In front of the dinner hall the respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un and his wife Ri Sol Ju greeted Song Tao and artistes of the Chinese art troupe.
					
					 The dinner proceeded in an intimate and amicable atmosphere as it took place together with Chinese comrades who came into genuine feelings and became more familiar with Korean people.
					
					 After the dinner was over, Kim Jong Un and Ri Sol Ju exchanged warm farewell greetings with Song Tao and other Chinese comrades, ardently sending them off.
					
					 Song Tao, on behalf of all the members of the Chinese art troupe, expressed once again deep thanks to Kim Jong Un for having accorded special and exceptional hospitality during their visit to Pyongyang.

articles.title: Chinese Art Troupe Visits Kim Won Gyun University of Music
articles.content:
Chinese Art Troupe Visits Kim Won Gyun University of Music
Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- The Chinese art troupe led by Song Tao, head of the International Liaison Department of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, visited Kim Won Gyun University of Music on Tuesday.
					 The guests were accompanied by Ri Chang Gun, vice department director of the C.C., Workers' Party of Korea, and Li Jinjun, Chinese ambassador to the DPRK.
					
					 Members of the Chinese art troupe were greeted by the teaching staff and students of the university with bouquets and a big clap.
					
					 Being briefed on the history of the university, the guests went round the room dedicated to the history of the university, classrooms, halls, concert hall and others.
					
					 Song Tao made an entry in the visitor's book that "Let's take over the valuable treasures of art and give free scope to the nation's culture."
					
					 The Chinese art troupe toured the Mangyongdae Schoolchildren's Palace and watched a performance given by art group members of the palace on Monday.

articles.title: Chinese Art Troupe Leaves
articles.content:
Chinese Art Troupe Leaves
Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- The Chinese art troupe led by Song Tao, head of the International Liaison Department of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, went back home Wednesday after brilliantly decorating the 31st April Spring Friendship Art Festival.
					 As the Chinese artistes arrived at the airport, a large crowd cheered them, waving pennants and bouquets.
					
					 Korean artistes presented members of the Chinese art troupe with bouquets.
					
					 Ri Su Yong, member of the Political Bureau and vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Kim Yo Jong, alternate member of the Political Bureau and first vice department director of the WPK Central Committee, Pak Chun Nam, minister of Culture, and other senior party and government officials bade farewell to Song Tao and other Chinese comrades.
					
					 The plane with the Chinese art troupe aboard took off amid the farewell-bidding by the senior party and government officials and the crowd.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Un from Arab Regional Body and Egyptian Party
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Un from Arab Regional Body and Egyptian Party
Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- The Arab Regional Committee for Friendship and Solidarity with the Korean People and the Socialist Freedom Party of Egypt presented a gift to the respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un in their joint name.
					 The gift was conveyed to So Ho Won, vice-chairman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries who took part in the inaugural ceremony of the organizing committee for the International Festival in Praise of the Great Persons of Mt Paektu, held in Minsk of Belarus on April 11.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets Party Delegation of DR Congo
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets Party Delegation of DR Congo
Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, met and had a friendly talk with the delegation of the Communist Party of DR Congo led by General Secretary Boswa Isekombe Sylvere which paid a courtesy call on him at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Wednesday.

articles.title: Greetings to Zimbabwean President
articles.content:
Greetings to Zimbabwean President
Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Wednesday sent a message of greeting to Emmerson Mnangagwa, president of the Republic of Zimbabwe, on the 38th anniversary of its independence.
					 Believing that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries with a long history and tradition will continue to strengthen, the message sincerely wished the president of Zimbabwe happiness in good health and the president and government of Zimbabwe bigger successes in their work for the development and prosperity of the country.

articles.title: Syrian Ambassador Hosts Reception
articles.content:
Syrian Ambassador Hosts Reception
Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- Tammam Sulaiman, Syrian ambassador to the DPRK, gave a reception at his embassy Wednesday to mark the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Present on invitation were Kim Yong Jae, minister of External Economic Relations, Ri Chang Gun, vice department director of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Ho Yong Bok, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, and officials concerned.
					
					 Speeches were made there.

articles.title: Director of Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il Foundation Here
articles.content:
Director of Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il Foundation Here
Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- Jin Yuhya, director of the Board of Directors of the Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il Foundation, and her party arrived here Wednesday.

articles.title: Foreign Guests Pay Tribute to Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Foreign Guests Pay Tribute to Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- A director of the Board of Directors of the Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il Foundation and her party laid a bouquet before the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill on Wednesday and made a bow to them.

articles.title: Chairman of Italian General Investment Group Visits Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Chairman of Italian General Investment Group Visits Mangyongdae
Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- Giancarlo Elia Valori, chairman of the Italian General Investment Group, visited Mangyongdae Wednesday.
					 He laid a floral basket at the old home of President Kim Il Sung in Mangyongdae with profound reverence for him.
					
					 He looked round historical relics preserved there, being briefed on the revolutionary history of the President.

articles.title: 31st April Spring Friendship Art Festival Closes
articles.content:
31st April Spring Friendship Art Festival Closes
Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- The 31st April Spring Friendship Art Festival closed with due ceremony at the East Pyongyang Grand Theatre Tuesday. It was opened in Pyongyang on April 11.
					 Present there were Pak Kwang Ho, vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, Jon Kwang Ho, vice-premier of the Cabinet, officials concerned and working people in the city.
					
					 Also, present were the Chinese art troupe led by Song Tao, head of the International Liaison Department of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, and other foreign artistes and delegations, overseas Korean artistes, foreign diplomatic envoys and representatives of international organizations and their wives, military attaches and their wives, embassy officials here and overseas Koreans.
					
					 Team special prize, the best prize of the festival, was awarded to the National Ballet of China, team prize to the Russian State Academic People's Chorus Named after M. E. Pyatnichki, Classical Ballet Group of the State Music Academy Theatre of Belarus, Chelyabinsk State Ural Dance Group of Russia, Volinaya Stepi Cossack Art Troupe of Russia and the Song and Dance Ensemble of the Mongolian Army and prizes of merit, creation, individual and ensemble to several artistes and art pieces.
					
					 Pak Chun Nam, minister of Culture who is chairman of the festival organizing committee, made a closing speech.
					
					 At the end of the closing ceremony, an art performance was given by artistes from various countries.
					
					 Chinese artistes made vivid representation of ballet pieces such as "one from Act 2 of ballet drama 'Swan Lake'" with bright and refined skills.
					
					 Serial choruses "Song of Changjiang", "Revolutionary Is Eternal Youth", "Dream of Glory" and other numbers impressively reflecting patriotism and will of the Chinese people deeply impressed the audience.
					
					 Artistes of Russia, Mongolia, Belarus, Spain and Armenia also put on the stage Korean songs including male solo and chorus "Song of Comradeship" and numbers of strong national coloring.

articles.title: Endless Stream of People Visit Kimilsungia Festival Venue
articles.content:
Endless Stream of People Visit Kimilsungia Festival Venue
Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- The reverence and yearning for President Kim Il Sung prevail the 20th Kimilsungia Festival venue.
					 At the festival venue presenting fascinating scenery with tens of thousands of potted Kimilsungias, the visitors looked back on the revolutionary life of Kim Il Sung, the peerless patriot and the great sage of the revolution.
					
					Since its opening of the festival, its venue has been visited by more than 210,000 servicepersons and working people from all walks of life, youths and students, overseas compatriots and foreigners.

articles.title: Seminar of Social Scientists Held
articles.content:
Seminar of Social Scientists Held
Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- A seminar of social scientists took place at the People's Palace of Culture Wednesday to mark the 70th anniversary of President Kim Il Sung's guidance over the historic Joint Conference of Representatives of Political Parties and Public Organizations in North and South Korea.
					 Present there were Ri Hye Jong, president of the Academy of Social Sciences, teachers, researchers, lecturers, journalists, editors and officials in the fields of science, education, press, preservation of revolutionary relics and party cadre training organs.
					
					 The seminar heard the papers explaining and proving the historic significance of the conference held at the initiative of the President and under his guidance.
					
					 Speakers said that the conference held in April Juche 37(1948) was the first historic victory won by the patriotic pro-reunification forces of the north and the south, true to the President's independent line for national reunification and idea of great national unity.
					
					 They noted that representatives from 56 political parties and social organizations in the north and the south, which had more than ten million members, took part in the joint conference in response to the patriotic call of Kim Il Sung with the will to accomplish the great cause common to the nation together with all the forces that love the country and the nation. This clearly showed how strong the patriotic desire of the Korean nation for independent national reunification was, they said.
					
					 The joint conference proved that different political forces and people from all walks of life could unite in the struggle for the cause common to the nation though they had differing ideology and isms, political views and religious belief and that independent and peaceful reunification of the country can be realized when the north and south get harmonious and the whole nation gets united, they stressed.

articles.title: Japanese Reactionaries' Military Moves Slammed
articles.content:
Japanese Reactionaries' Military Moves Slammed
Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- The Abe group of Japan set up a general ground force command for overall command over the military operations of the ground "Self-Defense Force". It also formed an "amphibious mobile force" called "Japan version of marines" and waged "exercises of seizing an island" with mobilization of this force.
					 In the meantime, Japan held the ceremony of putting into commission ultra-modern attack submarine Seiru and mine sweeper Hirado and is stepping up the final assembly of F-35A fighters after introducing parts for 42 fighters as part of its strong push for arming the SDF with attack weapons.
					
					 A commentary of Rodong Sinmun Wednesday brands this as a vicious challenge to the positive developments created on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The crafty Japanese reactionaries, who have sought their own interests through escalation of north-south confrontation and the tension on the peninsula, calculate that they have to incite the atmosphere of military confrontation in order to realize Japan's growing ambition for reinvasion. That's why they have vociferated about "threats" from someone and are spurring the moves for turning Japan into a military giant under this pretext.
					
					 Truly pitiful are the Japanese reactionaries as they hardly discard the narrow-minded habit of a political dwarf.
					
					 Those who fail to remember the past have no future and those who follow in the footsteps of criminals are bound to meet a severer punishment. This is the lesson of history.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries should not run amuck, mindful that their act of kicking up the militarist frenzy in a bid to stem the trend of the times will push them deeper into the abyss of isolation and destruction.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on Rosy Future of Korean Nation
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on Rosy Future of Korean Nation
Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- With the approach of the north-south summit meeting and talks to be noteworthy in the history of the national reunification movement, all Koreans are full of conviction in rosy future of the nation that holds the respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un in high esteem, Rodong Sinmun Wednesday says in an article.
					 The north-south summit meeting and talks are unthinkable without his rare wisdom, firm will for national reunification, broadminded magnanimity and noble compatriotism, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 On the summit meeting and talks to be held thanks to the steel-strong will for reunification and broadminded and compatriotic steps of Kim Jong Un, all Koreans at home and abroad praise him as the peerlessly great man taking the helm of the history and steering the trend of the world. They are convinced that the bright future is always in store for the nation when they value and maintain the good atmosphere of the north-south relations provided by him.
					
					 Immensely rosy is the future of our nation holding Kim Jong Un, heaven-sent great man of Paektu, in high esteem.
					
					 No persistent move of the anti-reunification forces can block the Korean nation vigorously advancing along the road of independent reunification under his leadership.

articles.title: S. Korea: Expert Discloses Injustice of Assertion of Cheonan Warship Case
articles.content:
S. Korea: Expert Discloses Injustice of Assertion of Cheonan Warship Case
Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- Sin Sang Chol, former member of the joint investigation team of south Korea over the case of sunken Cheonan warship, disclosed the injustice of the assertion made by the military authorities on the sinking of Cheonan warship.
					 In an article posted on the south Korean internet paper @ minplusnews on April 12, Sin cited 10 examples to disclose the said injustice.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Class Appears in Mali
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Class Appears in Mali
Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- An event for naming a class after Kim Il Sung took place at Progres School of Mali on April 14 ahead of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					Displayed at the venue was his photo.
					
					Attending the event were personages of the government, ministries, political parties and institutions and masses of Mali, and the DPRK ambassador to Mali and staff members of his embassy.
					
					Speeches were made there.
					
					A congratulatory message to the respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un was adopted at the event.

articles.title: Day of Sun Marked in Indonesia
articles.content:
Day of Sun Marked in Indonesia
Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- A Kimilsungia show and Korean book and photo exhibition was held in Jakarta on April 11 in the run-up to the Day of the Sun and the 53rd anniversary of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il's visit to Indonesia and the 53rd anniversary of the birth of Kimilsungia.
					 On display at the event venue were photos showing the revolutionary activities of the respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 There were also the works of the peerlessly great men of Korea and books and photos dealing with the successes made by the Korean army and people in building a powerful socialist country at the venue, replete with Kimilsungias in full bloom.
					
					 The venue was visited by personages of various strata and masses of Indonesia.
					
					 Meanwhile, the DPRK embassy in Jakarta hosted a reception on Apr. 12.
					
					 Present there on invitation were personages of the government, ministries, political parties and organizations, and institutions of Indonesia and foreign diplomatic envoys.
					
					 The DPRK ambassador and his embassy officials were on hand.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Introduced in India
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Introduced in India
Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- The Indian internet news Voice of Millions posted the full text of leader Kim Jong Il's work "Let Us Reunify the Country Independently and Peacefully through the Great Unity of the Entire Nation" on April 8 ahead of the 25th anniversary of his election as chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK.
					 The work, published on April 18, Juche 87 (1998), elucidates the five-point policy for the great national unity that serves as important guideline in achieving the great unity of the entire nation.
					
					 The news carried a photo of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Successful China Visit Hailed Abroad
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Successful China Visit Hailed Abroad
Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- Organizations of different countries issued statements between April 2 and 6 in congratulation of the respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's successful visit to China.
					 The Nepalese Association for Supporting the Songun Politics said that Kim Jong Un's unofficial visit to China marked a historic milestone, an event of great significance in developing through generations the DPRK-China friendship provided by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy noted that the news of Kim Jong Un's China visit rocked the whole world, stressing that it displayed the traditional ties of friendship between the two countries once again.
					
					 The Paektusan Czech-Korean Friendship Association extended warm congratulations to Kim Jong Un who made an enormous contribution to the strengthening of the traditional DPRK-China friendship provided and developed with much care by the preceding leaders and to the human cause of independence.
					
					 The Nigeria-Korea Friendship Association stressed that Kim Jong Un's China visit marked an important occasion in carrying forward through generations the history and tradition of friendship provided by the leaders of elder generations of the DPRK and China.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Chosen as Man of 2017 by Belarusian Magazine
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Chosen as Man of 2017 by Belarusian Magazine
Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- Magazine of Belarus "Social Education" chose the respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un as a man of 2017.
					 The certificate of choosing Kim Jong Un as a man of 2017 was conveyed to So Ho Won, vice-chairman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries who took part in the inaugural ceremony of the organizing committee for International Festival in Praise of the Great Persons of Mt Paektu held in Minsk, Belarus on April 11.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Introduced by Organization of DR Congo
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Introduced by Organization of DR Congo
Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- The National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea of Democratic Congo posted on its website the full text of the respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Add Eternal Brilliance to Comrade Kim Jong Il's Great Idea and Achievements of the Songun Revolution" on April 7 on the occasion of the 25th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK.
					 The work, published on Aug. 25, Juche 102 (2013), deals with the Songun revolutionary leadership feats of Kim Jong Il and the essence and originality of the Songun revolutionary idea and clarifies the tasks for successfully accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Songun.

articles.title: El Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un volvio a departir con Song Tao
articles.content:
El Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un volvio a departir con Song Tao
Pyongyang, 18 de Abril (ACNC) -- Kim Jong Un, Presidente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, volvio a departir el dia 17 con Song Tao, jefe del Departamento de Enlace Internacional del Comite Central del Partido Comunista de China.
					El felicito que la visita a Corea del grupo artistico chino dirigido por Song Tao, jefe del Departamento de Enlace Internacional del CC del PCCh, se realizo exitosamente bajo la especial atencion y esperanza de los partidos y gobiernos de los dos paises y evaluo altamente los esfuerzos de los companeros chinos quienes adornaron brillantemente el 31o Festival Artistico de Amistad Abril en Primavera.
					
					Dijo que la presente visita del grupo artistico chino a Corea fue un evento excelentisimo, que se realizo en el mejor periodo y logro un resultado admirable, consolido mas los especiales lazos y el sentimiento de respeto mutuo existentes entre los dos partidos y dos pueblos y creo el excelente ejemplo del intercambio cultural y artistico Corea-China.
					
					Song Tao dijo con emocion que en todas partes el pueblo coreano dio con fraternidad la calurosa y solemne bienvenida a los chinos y que a traves de esta ocasion se sintio calientemente el sentimiento particular y cordial del partido y pueblo coreanos al partido y pueblo chinos.
					
					En particular, volvio a expresar el profundo agradecimiento a las medidas tomadas directamente por el Presidente Kim Jong Un para ellos mismos y agrego que el exito de la presente visita del grupo artistico chino fue logrado enteramente por las relaciones particulares de amistad y las profundas atenciones y benevolencias de los Maximos Dirigentes de los dos partidos y dos paises China-Corea.
					
					El Maximo Dirigente dijo que en el futuro tambien el Comite Central de nuestro partido seguira esforzarse por fomentar mas la confianza politica entre los dos partidos y dos paises y llevar a una nueva etapa las relaciones Corea-China conforme a la demanda de la nueva epoca apoyandose en la base de la tradicional amistad y unidad.
					
					Intercambio con Song Tao las profundas opiniones sobre varios problemas para realizar animadamente el intercambio y viaje en varios dominios y fortalecer mas la cooperacion estrategica y tactica entre los dos partidos.
					
					Encomendo al jefe del departamento Song Tao transmitirle sin falta el caliente saludo al Secretario General Xi Jinping, amigo excelentisimo y camarada mas intimo del pueblo coreano, y el pueblo chino que dieron una gran alegria al pueblo coreano enviando el grupo artistico en el periodo significativo.
					
					La charla se realizo siempre en el ambiente camaraderil, sincero y amistoso.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un ofrece una cena para Song Tao y los artistas chinos
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un ofrece una cena para Song Tao y los artistas chinos
Pyongyang, 18 de abril (ACNC) -- Kim Jong Un, Presidente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, ofrecio el dia 17 una cena en honor de Song Tao, jefe del Departamento de Enlace Internacional del Comite Central del Partido Comunista de China y los artistas del grupo artistico de China.
					En la ocasion estuvieron presentes la senora Ri Sol Ju, Choe Ryong Hae, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del PTC y vicepresidente del Comite de Estado de la RPDC y del CC del PTC, Ri Su Yong, miembro del BP y vicepresidente del CC del PTC, Kim Yo Jong, miembro suplente del BP y primera subjefa de departamento del CC del PTC, los subjefes del CC del PTC Jo Yong Won, Kwon Hyok Bong, Kim Pyong Ho, Kim Song Nam y otros miembros del CC del PTC, asi como los artistas coreanos.
					
					A la comida fueron invitados Song Tao, jefe del Departamento de Enlace Internacional del CC del Partido Comunista de China, Li Jun, viceministro de Cultura y Turismo de Republica Popular China, los artistas del grupo artistico de China, y Li Jinjun, embajador extraordinario y plenipotenciario de la RPCh en Corea.
					
					Ante la sede de la cena, el Maximo Dirigente y su senora Ri Sol Ju acogieron el jefe del Departamento Song Tao y los artistas chinos.
					
					Se realizo en el ambiento amistoso la cena que se realizo con los camaradas chinos que establecieron el sentimiento mas sincero e intimo.
					
					Despues de la cena, el Maximo Dirigente y su senora Ri Sol Ju intercambiaron el saludo cordial de despedida con Song Tao y los artistas chinos y se despidieron de ellos.
					
					En representacion de todos los miembros del grupo artistico chino, Song Tao volvio a expresar el agradecimiento al Maximo Dirigente quien dio una acogida especial y excepcional durante la visita a Pyongyang.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam se reune con delegacion del Partido Comunista del Congo Democratico
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam se reune con delegacion del Partido Comunista del Congo Democratico
Pyongyang, 18 de abril (ACNC) -- Kim Yong Nam, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, departio el dia 18 en el Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae con la delegacion del Partido Comunista del Congo Democratico, presidida por su secretario general Boswa Isekombe Sylvere, que le realizo una visita de cortesia.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam felicita a Milo Djukanovic
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam felicita a Milo Djukanovic
Pyongyang, 18 de abril (ACNC) -- Kim Yong Nam, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, envio el dia 17 un mensaje de felicitacion a Milo Djukanovic, recien electo como presidente de Montenegro.
					Convencido de que las relaciones entre la RPDC y Montenegro se desarrollaran positivamente conforme a los intereses de los pueblos de ambos paises, el remitente formulo votos por los exitos en las responsabilidades del destinatario para la prosperidad del pais.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam envia mensaje de felicitacion al presidente de Zimbabwe
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam envia mensaje de felicitacion al presidente de Zimbabwe
Pyongyang, 18 de abril (ACNC) -- Con motivo del 38o aniversario de la independencia de Zimbabwe, Kim Yong Nam, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, extendio el dia 18 un mensaje de felicitacion al presidente de la Republica de Zimbabwe,  Emmerson Mnangagwa.
					En su misiva, el remitente expuso la seguridad de que seguiran fortaleciendose y desarrollandose las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre ambos paises que tienen larga historia y tradicion. 
					
					Y formulo sinceros votos por la salud y la felicidad del destinatario y por mayores exitos en las tareas de el y el gobierno de Zimbabwe para el desarrollo y la prosperidad del pais.

articles.title: Tammam Sulaiman ofrece banquete por el Dia del Sol
articles.content:
Tammam Sulaiman ofrece banquete por el Dia del Sol
Pyongyang, 18 de abril (ACNC) -- Con motivo del Dia del Sol, el embajador extraordinario y plenipotenciario de la Republica Arabe de Siria en Corea, Tammam Sulaiman, ofrecio el dia 18 un banquete en su sede diplomatica.
					Entre los invitados se distinguian Kim Yong Jae, ministro de Relaciones Economicas con el Extranjero, Ri Chang Gun, subjefe de departamento del CC del PTC, el vicecanciller Ho Yong Bok y los funcionarios interesados.
					
					En la ocasion hubo discursos.
